title: The Happy toilers
creator_credit: Keith David Smith and Children's Library and Craft Movement
brief_description: An amateur record of the efforts by children attending a crafts centre in a migrant hostel to build their own swimming pool. Made at Bradfield Park Housing Settlement and the Lane Cove National Park.
creator_credit_for_label: Keith David Smith and Children’s Library and Craft Movement
